code: import React from'react';import Button from'react-bootstrap/Button';import{Permission}from'../../config/Rotas_protegidas';import{mostrarAlertaConfirmacao}from'../../lib/swal';import{api}from'../../lib/Axios';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Buttons(_ref){let{dado,type,rota,title,onClick}=_ref;if(!Permission(rota))return null;const inativarUsuario=()=>{mostrarAlertaConfirmacao('Confirmação necessária','Tem certeza que deseja inativar o usuário?',()=>{return api(true).put("usuario/disable/".concat(dado.uuid));},200);};const ativarUsuario=()=>{mostrarAlertaConfirmacao('Confirmação necessária','Tem certeza que deseja aivar o usuário?',()=>{return api(true).put("usuario/enable/".concat(dado.uuid));},200);};if(type==='cadastrar'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:onClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"btn btn-primary btn-sm","data-bs-toggle":"offcanvas",role:"button",children:["Adicionar Novo ",title]})});}else if(type==='pesquisar'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:onClick,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{href:"#",className:"btn btn-primary shadow btn-xs sharp me-1",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-pencil-alt"})})});}else if(type==='inativar'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:inativarUsuario,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"danger",className:"shadow btn-xs sharp",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-ban"})})});}else if(type==='ativar'){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:ativarUsuario,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"success",className:"shadow btn-xs sharp",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-regular fa-circle-check"})})});}}
